title: React Notes App
description: This lightweight and user-friendly note-taking application is built using React. It comes with a set of features to enhance your note-taking experience.

title: Hangman Game
description: This interactive and visually appealing Hangman game is crafted with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Explore the challenge and fun as you guess the hidden word!

title: Color Palette Generator
description: Experience color creativity! Our Color Palette Generator, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, makes it easy to explore and craft stunning color schemes for your designs
